title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, Phi-3 and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: langchain-ai/langchain
summary: Python/JS framework ships built-in Ollama LLM and embeddings wrappers for RAG, agents, chains, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official TypeScript/JavaScript client for the Ollama REST API—works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library—pip install ollama—mirrors JS API for chat, generate, pull, etc.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for any Ollama model; runs in Docker, supports RAG, multi-user, themes.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Rust CLI that spins up a local RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + llama.cpp index.

title: chainlit/chainlit
summary: Python chat-UI framework adds one-line Ollama backend so you can visualize/debug local LLM conversations.

title: semantic-kernel-python
summary: Microsoft’s orchestration SDK now includes Ollama connector for planners, memories, and semantic functions.

title: haystack-ollama
summary: Deepset Haystack 2.0 integration lets you plug Ollama models into production-grade RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to a local Ollama model instead of OpenAI.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform CLI wrapper (Go) with readline, chat history, prompt templates, and model switching.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK and Blazor demo that exposes Ollama chat, generate, and pull via strongly-typed REST client.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-driven recipes: function-calling, voice bots, Docker Compose stacks, GPU tuning, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling, PVC, and optional GPU nodes.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module that provides an injectable Ollama service with RxJS streaming for TypeScript backends.

title: ollama-huggingface
summary: Utility to convert any HuggingFace GGUF model into Ollama Modelfile format and push to your local registry.
